body_html:
@andrehentz
Using a retrained inception v3 model with 100 classes

bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms/transform_graph \ --in_graph=retrained_graph.pb \ --out_graph=transformed_graph.pb \ --inputs='Mul' \ --outputs='final_result' \ --transforms=' add_default_attributes strip_unused_nodes(type=float, shape="1,299,299,3") remove_nodes(op=Identity, op=CheckNumerics) fold_old_batch_norms quantize_weights quantize_nodes strip_unused_nodes sort_by_execution_order'
body:
@andrehentz 
Using a retrained inception v3 model with 100 classes

`bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms/transform_graph \
--in_graph=retrained_graph.pb \
--out_graph=transformed_graph.pb \
--inputs='Mul' \
--outputs='final_result' \
--transforms='
 add_default_attributes
 strip_unused_nodes(type=float, shape="1,299,299,3")
 remove_nodes(op=Identity, op=CheckNumerics)
 fold_old_batch_norms
 quantize_weights
 quantize_nodes
 strip_unused_nodes
 sort_by_execution_order'`
